title: Didn't see mystery skin
body: So I closed the mystery skin text before I could actually see what I got and I looked through my history to see if there was a way to see it there. Is there a way to see what I got mystery gifted from the 10-year anniversary event?

replies.body: The mystery text skin (or toast) was to notify you that you received the Anniversary Icon.  Your account hasn't received any other gifts yet, and it will take time for everything to roll out for every account.  It won't be all at once, and updates will be posted on the [support ticker.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-)  I hope that clears things up but let me know!
